item.title: Apache camel
item.author: nomikosi@thefuriousprogrammer.com (Iakovos Nomikos)
item.description: Recently I had the opportunity to play with Apache Camel and Spring Boot. I found the result quite entertaining! If you haven’t heard the name before, it is an open source routing tool which can receive messages, process them and send them to other destinations. In my case, I was reading payment messages from one topic, storing them in a db and then scheduled request with a POST call to another server.
